app.title: SAT20 Market
app.version_update_title: There is a new version, do you want to update it?

transaction.title: Split, Merge & Transfer
transaction.balance_des: When the balance is less than 546 sats, the remaining balance is transferred to the miners.

explorer.title: Explorer
explorer.subtitle: Check out OrdX balance of the address.
explorer.des: Recognize all operations including DEPLOY, MINT and TRANSFER.
explorer.not_support: Viewing the transferred balance is temporarily unavailable.

transfer.title: Transfer
transfer.error_2: The number of provided receiving addresses does not match the transfer quantity.

name.title: Name
name.description_1: Supports suffixes: for example, .btc, .x, .pizza, and no suffix.
name.description_2: Free minting: you can free mint names with the supported suffixes above until block 861778.
name.description_3: Names left to minted after block 861778
name.error_3: The batch casting quantity cannot exceed 2000

files.name: Files
files.upload_des_1: Drag and drop your files here, or click to select files

text.name: Text
text.single_des: Input what you want to inscribe on BTC
text.bulk_des: If bulk, we will inscribe one for every new line.

ordx.name: OrdX
ordx.cn_placeholder: For example, cn=1000, 1000 consecutively numbered sats
ordx.trz_placeholder: For example, trz=8, it means that the sat number has 8 zeros at the end.
ordx.block_helper: The effective time of mint is approximately from {{start}} to {{end}}.
ordx.error_2: Deploy must have Block or Rarity or Regular Expression
ordx.error_5: Mint amount must be less than {{limit}}
ordx.error_8: {{tick}} contains special sat and cannot be cast
ordx.error_9: The minimum height of the block is less than {{block}}, the ticker is invalid and will not be indexed by the indexer
ordx.error_10: The starting height of the block must be less than the ending height
ordx.error_16: The Max must must greater than limit
ordx.error_19: The quantity is too large, please split it first
ordx.rarity_helper: Special sat attributes required for mint.

step_two.title: Please double check your text below before continuing:

step_three.select_fee: Select the network fee you want to pay:
step_three.address_hint: Please note the inscribing transaction delivers the inscription to the receiving address directly.
step_three.output_one_utxo: Whether to output a UTXO for batch inscriptions
step_three.tight_one_utxo: Whether tight to output a UTXO for batch inscriptions
step_three.cycle_fill: Loop through the above addresses to {{len}}
step_three.error_2: The number of provided receiving addresses does not match the minting quantity.
step_three.error_3: Wallet address format is incorrect, please change it to a Taproot address.

fee.high_hint: The current Bitcoin network is highly congested. please be patient and wait.

order.name: Order List
order.continue: (If an error message appears during the process, please click the button to continue trying again.)

step_two.name: Payment Result
step_two.des: Please wait for the payment to be confirmed.

step_three.name: Start Inscribing
step_three.hint: Minting in progress, please do not close!
step_three.des: Please wait for the inscription to be confirmed.

totast.success: Congratulations, you are eligible for the lottery! The list of winners will be announced on Twitter after the event, please stay tuned!
totast.error: Sorry, you need to continue to complete the task!
